Question: In 1998, Azermarka issued postage stamps with both Azeri and English captions, commemorating this person.
Hints: In June 1995, this person went to Venice to visit the Venice Biennale art festival.
This person was also given a chest full of gold jewelry, a silver tea set, and a gold embroidered Bedouin gown.
In 2005 Martin Sastre premiered during the Venice Biennial the film this person: The Rose Conspiracy.
